title: My pixel 3 xl is randomly creating emoji image folder in my gallery. How to stop that happening?
content: My pixel 3 xl is randomly creating emoji image folder in my gallery. It's really annoying, cause even if I delete those, they come again. Some were related to Facebook page app, which I deleted, but I that app thought. But these right here in the screenshot, I don't where and how they always regenerate in my gallery. Note I always empty the recycle bin when I delete those folders. Anybody can help please?
